title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing dead people in a dream

preview.html: Dead in a dream Seeing a dead person is one of the visions in which there is much controversy and disagreement among interpreters. Jurists have begun to interpret the vision of a dead person according to his appearance, condition, actions and words. Therefore, the vision is praiseworthy in some cases, and disliked in other cases. In this article, we look at all the indications and cases in more detail. And the explanation as we list some of the details that differ from one person to another and affect the context of the dream. Dead in a dream Seeing death or death represents fears, self-talk and obsessions that move the heart and prevent a person from thinking correctly and making sound judgments. It is said about death: It is evidence of the death of the heart, self-control, tolerance of pleasures, committing sins and disobedience, and seeing the dead person if he is happy, he rejoices in what is in him, and if he dances. He is satisfied with God's blessings upon him, but the sadness of the dead is evidence of distress and anguish. And whoever sees the dead in an unknown place, and the soul returns to him, this indicates glory, honor, wisdom, and the acquisition of spoils and great advantages. The dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin sees that seeing the dead is related to his condition, appearance, and actions. Whoever sees the dead dancing, he is happy with what God has provided him and is happy with his place, and if the dead is fair to him, he urges the living to him and leads him to good and justice for him. And all other forms of entertainment and impurities are not praiseworthy, and whoever sees the dead doing evil, it is forbidden for him and calls him to abandon evil, and whoever sees that he is searching for a dead person, he should review his reality and search. For his biography in the world, and he can follow his approach. And whoever sees the dead alive, this indicates the resurrection of faded hopes and the disappearance of despair from the heart and the removal of worries and distress. The dead in the dream of singles Seeing a dead person or death symbolizes the loss of hope in something, fear of the future, excessive anxiety and listening to one's concerns. And if she sees an unknown dead person telling her about something, this indicates divine care that will come to her from where she does not expect, and she can receive excellent advice or advice that will help her meet her needs. And if you see the dead in dirty clothes, this indicates poverty and the situation turns upside down, and successive worries and sorrows, but if you see a dead person with blackness on his face, death appears in disbelief, God forbid, and the vision warns and sermons. What is the interpretation of a dream of talking to the dead for a single woman? Whoever sees that he is talking to the dead, this indicates longing and lack of care and protection, and he may miss him if he knows him while he is awake, and if he is really really afraid of leaving him. Or his withdrawal from it. And if she spoke to the deceased about something, this indicates a request for help and advice, and he can follow the advice of the deceased, and tends to adhere to his instructions to deal with the shortcomings and shortcomings in his life. A dead person in a dream for a married woman Seeing the dead indicates poor condition, distress, deterioration of living conditions, confusion and dispersion in decision-making. And if she sees the dead telling her that he is alive, this indicates the resurrection of hopes and hopes of disappearance, opening the doors of livelihood and relief, and getting out of hardships and hardships. And whoever sees the dead laughing, this indicates happiness, bliss and abundance of strength

A dead person in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the dead indicates a bad condition, distress, deterioration of living conditions, and confusion. And distraction in decision-making. If she sees the dead person telling her that he is alive, this indicates the resurrection of hopes and hopes of disappearance, the opening of the doors of sustenance and relief, and a way out of adversity and adversity. And whoever sees the dead person laughing, this indicates happiness, bliss, and abundance of strength.

title: Interpretation of a dream about finding paper money and receiving it in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about finding banknotes and receiving them in a dream from scholars. The site has nothing to do with interpretations, but it is from diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream about finding banknotes and receiving them in a dreamIt is possible that the vision of finding banknotes in a dream indicates some The differences and problems that the dreamer may face in his life at that time. Whoever sees in a dream that he finds a bank note, this indicates some changes that may occur in the dreamer’s life during that period, and he must ask for God’s help. A dream about finding paper money may indicate... The dream indicates fears that the dreamer may face in his life during this period, and God knows best. If you see yourself taking paper money in a dream, this may indicate financial problems that the dreamer may face in his life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about finding and receiving blue banknotes In a dream: Seeing yourself receiving blue paper money in a dream may indicate the success and excellence that the dreamer enjoyed in his life during those days. Whoever dreams of blue paper money in a dream may indicate achieving goals and ambitions to a large extent during this period, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing blue paper money in a dream indicates that the dreamer is seeking to achieve his goals and ambitions in a significant way. It is possible that seeing blue paper money in a dream indicates some good changes that occur in a person’s life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream Finding gold in the sea in a dream: Anyone who dreams of finding gold in the sea in a dream may indicate the great success that the dreamer may achieve in his life at that time. Finding gold in the sea in a dream may indicate the challenges that the dreamer will face in those days, and God I know. Anyone dreaming that they went to the sea and found gold in the dream can indicate the dreamer’s attempt to fulfill desires and dreams. Seeing finding gold in the sea in a dream means getting rid of the problem that the dreamer was facing and happy events that will come to him thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream Finding a dead person in a dream Whoever sees that he found a dead body in a dream can indicate that the deceased needs to receive many supplications during this period. Dreaming about finding a dead person in the dream that we know can indicate that the deceased needs mercy and prayers for him in an unusual way. If you see finding a corpse in a dream, this may indicate that you are facing some fears and problems in the dreamer’s life during these days. If you see finding a corpse in a dream, this may indicate changes in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of finding Socks in a dream Seeing finding socks in a dream may indicate some conflicts that the dreamer may face in his life. And God knows best. Dreaming of finding socks in a dream may indicate an extensive diet and money that the dreamer gains a lot of money

title: Interpretation of military clothing in a dream and military uniform in a dream

preview.html: Meanings of military uniforms for married and unmarried men and women and wearing military uniforms for girls in war, whether she is a soldier or someone wearing a military uniform by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about army clothing by Ibn Sirin. Clothes and military uniforms in a dream are a sign of dignity and pride. Whoever sees in his dream that he is wearing a military uniform will have a distinguished position in the world. The future, whether on the professional level or on the social level in general, and this interpretation applies to both men and women at the same time. The military uniform also expresses the nobility of the dreamer’s personality, as it shows his loyalty and sacrifice. If he sees an unmarried girl as if she is wearing a military uniform, this is a good interpretation and indicates Positive changes in life. Military dress also indicates solidity and severity of character. It indicates the dreamer’s discipline in many matters, whether emotional or practical. As for an unmarried woman who dreams that she meets a handsome young man wearing an officer’s uniform, this is interpreted as very good luck. Perhaps the dream foretells That she will marry a socially prominent person or a person with noble qualities. A married woman who sees in her dream that her husband is wearing a military uniform means professional promotion. As for a married woman who sees in her dream that her children are wearing a military uniform or uniform, this portends the success of these children or their obtaining jobs. Prestigious in the future. Everything related to soldiers, soldiers and officers is in a dream a good thing, except for wars and battles. If a pregnant woman sees that she is wearing a military suit or uniform, this is interpreted as safety and security, whether in pregnancy or in the health condition in general. Military clothing in a pregnant woman’s dream has meanings related to goodness and may indicate positive changes in the future, whether the pregnant woman sees She herself is wearing it or she saw someone she knows wearing it. The meaning is clear and can be summarized in (safety, security, progress, change). Military clothing in a man’s dream indicates social and professional stability and is sometimes an omen, especially if the man sees it adorned with medals and medals on the chest and shoulders. If he sees that he is wearing a new officer’s uniform, he can get a better job than his current one. A white military uniform may indicate marriage for a bachelor, but medals or decorations may indicate academic certificates or titles, such as a master’s degree, doctorate, or professorship. Battle uniform, Which is usually devoid of decorations or embellishments and its color gradually from yellow to green, suggests difficult situations or challenges that the viewer may face. A student can see it before the exam begins. A traveler can see it before he travels, and he sees every man waiting for him with grave responsibilities, whether at work or abroad. The meanings of this garment are often positive and relate to success, perseverance, or struggle. In the end, ordinary clothing in a dream remains worthy of praise, whether it is the clothing of soldiers, security men, or policemen, provided that it is clean and decent, not torn or limp. Interpretation of a dream about wearing an army uniform for girls in the

title: Interpretation of seeing my cousin in a dream and its repercussions

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing my cousin in a dream: An aunt is like a loving mother, kindness and tenderness with her sister’s daughters, as is the case with my cousin’s daughter. She is like a sister and is the partner who shares the girl in many issues of her life and supports her as well. Interpretation of seeing my cousin’s daughter in a dream It shows evidence, but knowledge depends on what the vision indicates, what the events in the dream were, and how the condition of the dreamer and the one being seen was as well. Interpretation of seeing my cousin in a dream. Interpretation of seeing my cousin in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The presence of the cousin’s daughter in the dream, and there was nothing bad in it, is evidence of goodness. Interpretation of seeing your cousin in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a cousin in a girl’s dream symbolizes the good that will come to the girl and that her life will change for the better. But if you see her getting married in her dream, it will be good news from God about the livelihood and beautiful things that will come to her. And if he sees She is suffering from something bad in her health, so this dream is considered a bad omen for what will happen to her stool. Interpretation of seeing my cousin’s daughter in a dream for a single woman. My cousin’s dream about an unmarried girl has meaning for her. Interpretation of seeing my cousin’s daughter in a dream about an unmarried woman. Seeing the cousin’s daughter in a dream in the dreamer’s house and using her bathroom symbolizes the closeness of the sleeping girl’s relationship. Also, seeing the cousin’s daughter with an attractive appearance portends progress in her work or the coming of goodness and joy to her. It also indicates that seeing his unmarried cousin in a dream indicates That the love relationship he is experiencing will culminate in marriage and he will achieve what he wants. Whereas, if you see that she is borrowing or that her cousin gave her something, this is good news that something good will come and people will be happy for her. On the other hand, if she borrows a beautiful dress from her cousin in a dream This foretells that she will get the job she wants in a wonderful position. Also, seeing his cousin’s daughter in a dream also involves the dreamer, which indicates that he feels stable and confident. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing an aunt in a dream for a single and married woman. Interpretation of dreams for a quarrel with a son My unmarried uncle. Seeing a quarrel with her cousin in a dream may indicate what is happening in her reality of a family quarrel with a family member. She also expresses her feelings towards this girl out of her bad feeling towards her. But if this quarrel is not at hand, rather it is Rather a dangerous thing, it is an indication that her life is bleak, which made her hurt others through disagreements and conflicts. Interpretation of seeing my cousin giving birth to an unmarried woman in a dream Seeing that her cousin’s daughter gave birth to a baby girl in a dream symbolizes the end of sadness, good news, livelihood, joy, and the beautiful thing that will happen Soon. Seeing my cousin getting married in a dream with a single woman. Seeing my cousin as a bride in a dream, and she was beautiful and happy with her, is a good sign, whether it is work, marriage, or something beautiful. But if she is a bride but is not happy with this marriage, it is a warning that she will suffer from Sorrows, crises, and losses. See also: Interpretation of a dream about losing a son

title: Interpretation of a dream about a key and a door for a divorced woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a key and a door in a dream for a single girl: If a girl sees a golden key in her dream, this indicates that she will marry a rich man. When a single girl sees that she may have a key, she does not know its identity. This dream is a sign for her of the key to her future home after her marriage God willing. Perhaps this vision is a sign of good things that will come to her. Seeing her failing because she repeatedly tried to open the door and she had several keys with her. This dream indicates that he will pray the Istikhara prayer for some solutions to the problems in which he faced many problems, God willing, God knows best. The iron key in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates marriage to a real man who carries connotations of masculinity. And if she sees herself opening the door with the key, then this dream brings her prosperous goodness in her future, God willing. The key in the girl’s dream is a sign to her that her life will witness wonderful and good events. It will make her the best she can be, God willing. Seeing a familiar person giving her a key in a dream could be a sign of blessing in her life or it could be happiness that comes to her. See also: Seeing a key in a single woman’s dreamInterpretation of seeing a key and a door in a dream for a married womanSeeing a married woman in The dream is looking for the key to the house, but does not find it. This indicates that sad things will happen, but God will grant them their death within a short time, God willing. But if she sees that her husband gives her a straight key as a gift, not in the dream. A warning and a warning to her that her husband is taking the rights of orphans She must remind him of God and His punishment. And God knows best. Giving a key in a woman’s dream could be a sign of sustenance and goodness that will come to her, God willing. When a woman finds a key in a dream, it means that she will get something new that only God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a key and a door in a dream for a man and its meaning: Seeing a large wrench in a man’s dream symbolizes the great goodness that can be gained from a great deed that God has taught him. Whether you see someone offering a key to someone in his dream, it may be a sign of the arrival of goodness, thanks to God. And if he sees himself in a dream carrying many keys, then this The dream is good news for him that he will gain prestige and power, and God knows best. Seeing failure to find the key after searching a lot for it. This symbolizes that this person will suffer from some difficulties in his life, but they will go away by God’s command. The key in a person’s dream is seen as news. Sarah about the end of tribulation and a great supply that God will receive. When a man sees a closed door, it means that he will be victorious over his enemies. And God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about opening a door without a key. The meaning of seeing a key and a door in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. When you see an attempt to take the key from the husband in a pregnant woman’s dream, with the husband refusing. This is a sign of getting the opportunity to travel, but in a short time God will bring them together. Seeing a medallion containing a large number of keys to many houses and owning it in a dream is good news and ease in the affairs of her life, God willing.

title: Interpretation of a dream about selling a house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about selling a house in a dream, interpretation of dreams is one of the important things that many dreamers need, and interpretation of a dream about selling a house in a dream is one of the dreams that many people dream about. People with weak family relationships that contain various problems, and this vision does not bring. An information article about what is the interpretation of seeing selling in a dream and what is the interpretation of seeing the vision of buying a house in a dream and the dream of selling a house in a dream and the interpretation for you of seeing selling a family home in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing selling in a dream? In Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing selling in a dream, it Indicates purchase. He will gain dignity, strength, and pride in the coming period, and the interpretation of this dream varies depending on the situation of selling it. What is the interpretation of seeing buying a house in a dream? Seeing a market between the two in a dream shows the situation to the dreamer that his circumstances will change significantly in this world, and seeing a large market It appears that the owner of this vision is rich, whether he is poor or rich. If he is one of the poor, then God Almighty makes him rich, and if he is one of the rich, then this indicates the continuation of obtaining money and wealth in a permissible manner, and this vision for its owners alleviates the worry and anxiety that it carries. The coming period, God willing, and he will be happy. A dream about selling a house in a dream. A dream about selling a house in a dream indicates separation between him and his wife and divorce between them in the coming period, but the dreamer suffers from a state of instability in his family, and the interpretation of this dream is according to the details provided by the dreamer and the situation in which he was. On it during the vision and the time of its occurrence.Interpretation of seeing the sale of the family home in a dreamThe interpretation of seeing the sale of the family home in a dream indicated the state of instability in which the owners of this house exist and they must reconcile with each other in the near future, because selling the family home does not inspire it. It is good in most cases for the owners of the house, as it is the house in which they gathered from their childhood until they grew up. Therefore, all family members must be careful to keep this house full and a memory of their family. If this vision is not of the family home, it leads to divorce and separation between the fortuneteller and his wife. It is noteworthy that the science of dream interpretation holds many clues and interpretations of one vision according to its details...the dream.

title: Interpretation of a naked deceased in a dream: Seeing a naked deceased in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of a naked dead person means good deeds, good deeds, and other interpretations, and we interpret it for an unmarried woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a man, such as a deceased person without clothing, or to take off the clothes of a dead person, whether unknown or known, or a naked deceased person, or a brother, son, or father, and you see the dead person in underwear, or a dream about a deceased person. By changing Ibn Sareed’s clothes, etc. In continuation of the topic, the interpretation of the dead person naked in a dream may mean that you see the dead person naked in a dream in relation to the comfort of the dead person in the afterlife, or it may be an indication of the good deeds of the deceased, as the interpretation here depends on the work of the deceased and his condition in his world, and if the dead person is seen naked, his private parts while laughing indicate his bliss. If he dreams that he died naked on the ground, then he will be poor. In the case of the dead person, if he is alive in the dream and walking, or he is seen in a dream, and his private parts are visible, then supplication and good deeds are necessary from the dreamer, if he is near or near. As for if he From the unknown or those far away in knowledge, this is a message that advises the dreamer that he is walking on a path that leads to the destruction of religion and the sins, heresies, and taboos that will follow him and destroy him on his day. From the symptom. As for finding an unknown dead person whose organs are visible, it may indicate death, illness, or poverty, and some say that it portends not falling into sin for an act that the dreamer intends to do, and all of the above is for both. Men and women. When seeing a deceased relative, such as a father, mother, sister, brother, and others, if their private parts are exposed after they are covered, they are asked to pay either from the debt, or the required Hajj in return or work that one of the living, especially the priest, wants, because the dead wanted it. It can indicate This dream for a woman and a man indicates a secret revealed by his relatives that would tear his jacket, especially for women who hid it and did not want anyone to know it, and for men a work secret that he had. Deception or injury in money or life or deception, and his relationship appears and reveals just as the nakedness of the dead person was revealed in a dream. As for revealing the private parts of a well-known man who is not one of his relatives in a dream, it is a message and advice to the deceased that he is about to do an act that contains suspicions and taboos. Despite the nakedness of the dead, a stranger appeared and revealed that the dreamer It is not known, because it is a recent or very old event that the dreamer almost forgets. The one who sees the person is exposed to a dead person and did not know him and remained unknown in the dream, because the vision is considered a sign and a warning or a warning to the forerunner of some deeds and his distance from God, and that this dreamer will fall into some deeds. . It brings him the wrath and wrath of God, so he returns to God and approaches Him. The vision may indicate disasters and diseases that will afflict the dreamer, or that he will be afflicted with poverty and need. But if the dead person whose nakedness appeared to the dreamer was known and was alive in the dream, but his nakedness appeared, then the vision shows the need of this dead person for some pure prayers and deeds. The righteousness of this dreamer is intercession for the dead. With God Almighty. And the person who sees in his dream one of his family members has died in reality, and that dead person has had his organs exposed, so the vision shows that dead person’s need for some matters such as performing Hajj on his behalf, or that. Some debts weigh him down and he wants to get out of the situation

title: I dreamed that my husband married Ali and I was very happy

preview.html: Today we are discussing the interpretation of a dream that my husband married Ali, and I am happy for single women, married women, pregnant women, divorcees, young men and men. Interpretation of seeing my husband married Ali and I am happy in a dream about a single girl. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is married and that her husband is her sister’s husband. The vision is an indication that someone will propose She must soon. His features should resemble her sister’s husband, whether the similarity is in appearance or morals. Some scholars also interpreted it as an indication that the groom who proposes to the unmarried girl is a relative of her sister’s husband. Or perhaps she is close to him as a close friend of her sister’s husband in real life. A wedding in a dream of one girl in general. A great indication of the presence of food and benefits that the dreamer will receive in her life, and a lot of goodness that is not wasted. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream that she is a second wife in a dream with a man he does not know that she will marry him and she was happy. It indicates The vision indicates that the girl will get a lot of money in the coming period. If he sees in a dream that he is marrying a man and the unmarried girl is his second wife. The vision is one of the fortuneteller’s auspicious visions, as in the next few days he will get a job that he dreamed of. If an unmarried girl dreams She married a married man in a dream and was very happy with him. The vision indicates that this girl will enjoy success in her next life by God’s command. See also: Interpretation of a dream about my husband, Ali, who is married and his wife is pregnant. Interpretation of seeing my husband, Ali, married and I am happy in a dream about a married woman. If a woman sees A married woman that her husband married her in a dream and the marriage was a secret. A promising vision for the monarch as it indicates a visit to the Sacred House of God soon, to perform Hajj or Umrah rituals. A married woman who saw in a dream that her husband was marrying another woman she did not know and the marriage was a secret. A vision indicating that the woman is in In her next life, she will obtain a high position in the job she is working on. This festival, which she had never dreamed of before. A man marrying another woman in a married woman’s dream without telling her that he would marry. Important evidence of a married woman traveling in the future to visit the Kaaba. Also, seeing a woman Married in her dream indicates that her husband married another woman. It is a good sign that there will be a lot of sustenance and a lot of money that will soon prevail over the mother and her family. If a married woman dreams that she is marrying her sister’s husband. Her vision is evidence of the presence of goodness that will rule her. And on her family. And may God grant her success in her life and achieve what she desires, God willing. Seeing a married woman’s husband in a dream marrying her to another woman whom she does not know and who appears bad to her. The vision shows that the husband does not feel stable with the wife that he “sees” in his life, and with whom he lives Indeed, the scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of a married woman in her dream as her husband marrying another woman. Her vision means that the husband has many ambitions that he seeks to achieve in his life, but in the end he was unable to reach and achieve them. If the married woman sees in her dream that

title: The meaning of seeing prickly pear in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing prickly pears in a dream indicates goodness, food after toil, and success after fatigue, while seeing peeled prickly pears means food, money, and success without effort. Whoever sees prickly pears in a dream and is a merchant, this indicates a lot of profit. The following is the interpretation of seeing prickly pears in a dream for a son. Sirin. Interpretation of seeing prickly pears in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees prickly pears in a dream, this indicates that she is a useful girl and that she has enemies in Islam. But if an unmarried girl sees prickly pear leaves in a dream, this means that there is remorse and sadness in her. And she will leave. But if she dreams that she is eating prickly pears, this indicates kindness and nourishment for her. If you see prickly pears in a dream, this means righteous and upright people. Interpretation of seeing prickly pears in a married woman’s dream: Seeing a married woman eating prickly pears in a dream, this indicates that there is goodness in her. But if she sees prickly pears in a dream, this indicates the presence of evil for her and her family. But if a married woman sees that she and her family are eating prickly pears, this indicates wealth and livelihood for her and her family. Interpretation of seeing prickly pears in a man’s dreamIf a man sees in his dream that He eats prickly pears, this indicates the presence of goodness and care for them. If he sees prickly pears, this indicates that there is no good for him. But if he sees that he eats a few prickly pears, this indicates that there is good and abundant food for him. Interpretation of seeing prickly pears in a dream Pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees prickly pears, this indicates harm to her and her child. However, if a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is eating prickly pears, this indicates the presence of goodness and livelihood for her and her child. But if a pregnant woman dreams of seeing prickly pears in a dream as if they were black, This indicates a false oath. Seeing a black prickly pear in a dream indicates descending into the Haram. Interpretation of seeing a prickly pear in a young man’s dream. If a young man dreams that he is eating a prickly pear, this indicates the presence of goodness and food. As for seeing a black prickly pear, it indicates a false oath. But if he sees If a young man sees a prickly pear, this portends grief, grief, and sadness soon. But if a young man sees that he is eating dried prickly pears, this indicates his nourishment and recovery from his illness. If a young man sees a black prickly pear in his dream, this indicates illness and discomfort. Interpretation of seeing prickly pears in Dream: As for seeing gooseberries in a dream, it indicates kindness and a lot of money for the fortuneteller. As for whoever sees the thorns of a prickly pear in his dream and it affects him, this indicates that God will grant him abundant money. In conclusion, we mentioned to you the interpretation of seeing a prickly pear in a dream for a single girl, a man, and a married woman. A pregnant woman and a young man as well.

title: Interpretation of the oud in a dream. Interpretation of the dream about firewood

preview.html: Today we present to you the interpretation of the oud in a dream, which is extracted from the agarwood tree endemic to East Asia, and the wood contains volatile oils with a distinctive smell that are used in the manufacture of perfumes and incense. Through the following lines from the encyclopedia, we will learn about it. The interpretation of the dream of the oud and the different cases of these visions. The interpretation of the oud in a dream is believed by the famous dream interpreter Abdul God bin Shirin said that seeing incense in a dream is one of the visions that heralds good news for the pioneer. Whoever sees in a dream that he smokes his house and perfumes the house with a sweet scent, then this vision shows that his wife is a fair and loving woman, who protects his house and loves him very much, because she “takes care of his affairs.” It occupies a lot of her thoughts. It is also believed that seeing wood incense in a dream or smelling its scent indicates the good news that will come to the fortuneteller and he will feel happy to hear it because of the changes that will occur in his life. The symbol of incense in a dream And if someone dreams that he planted incense and it grew in his house, then this dream means that God Almighty will grant him a righteous son who will help him in this world and raise him up on the Day of Resurrection. And whoever sees in his dream that he is smoking incense with a stick, this vision symbolizes that the dreamer has good morals, and also has the qualities of generosity, integrity, and honor. And if he sees that he is smoking another person, because this person will need the help of a fortuneteller. And the fortuneteller will do everything in his power to provide him with help and assistance. Oud incense in a single woman’s dream. Dream interpreters say that the connotations of incense are the same in a dream, regardless of its type: For an unmarried girl who sees oud incense in a dream, this dream indicates that the girl enjoys... With good morals and right behavior, she also has a good biography among people and is always remembered for her kindness. And if she dreams that she is burning incense and it smells good, then this is good news that she will be able to achieve what she wants and will reach her goals and ambitions and overcome the obstacles that she may face to achieve them. Objectives. Some commentators said that a girl who sees incense in a dream and smells its pleasant scent means that the girl will marry a righteous man. Oud incense in the dream of a pregnant and married woman. If a married woman sees incense in her dream, it means that this woman has good morals and is always close to God through Obedience. And if she sees that she is lighting incense and the pleasant scent emanating from it spreads throughout the house, then this dream warns this woman that she will soon receive good news and that this news will change her life for the better. If there are disagreements and problems between a married woman and her husband, or between her husband’s relatives, Or one of her relatives, and she saw frankincense in her dream, then this vision foretells that these disputes will end and friendship will return again in these relationships. For a pregnant woman who sees incense in her dream, her vision indicates that she will get rid of the worries and problems that surround her, and it also indicates that she will hear news that will make her happy. And if she dreams that she is lighting a stick of incense, then this dream is good news for her that her child will be a male, God willing. Buying incense In a dream, if the husband sees that he is buying incense and giving it to his wife
